===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ふういん}} compound {{m|ltc|封印|tr=pjowng ʔjinH|lit=to enclose, to seal + stamp, seal}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|封印|tr=fēngyìn}}.
